text.content:
Prone

Source: XPHB, page 372

While you have the Prone condition, you experience the following effects. Your only movement options are to Crawling|XPHB|crawl or to spend an amount of movement equal to half your Speed|XPHB (round down) to right yourself and thereby end the condition. If your Speed|XPHB is 0, you can't right yourself.You have Disadvantage|XPHB on attack rolls. An attack roll against you has Advantage|XPHB if the attacker is within 5 feet of you. Otherwise, that attack roll has Disadvantage|XPHB.
